Package it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action

Class ActionFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.bean.action.ActionFactory
public class ActionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to create the correct action in response to a given operation
See Also:
Action, Operation

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Action createAction​(Operation operation, java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String nickname)
    Create an instance of the correct type of action based on the parameters passed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • createAction

      public static Action createAction​(Operation operation, java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String nickname)
      Create an instance of the correct type of action based on the parameters passed. The created action also contains the correct arguments.
      Parameters:
      operation - The current operation that came with the previous options.
      object - Contains the arguments to put into the new action. It can be of various types.
      nickname - The player's nickname who generated the action.
      Returns:
      The correct action that will be send to the server.
      See Also:
      Operation
